connector.description:
Sets a new status (transition to) of an existing issue in Jira.

The Kamelet expects the following headers to be set:

- `issueKey` / `ce-issueKey`: as the issue unique code.

- `issueTransitionId` / `ce-issueTransitionId`: as the new status (transition) code. You should carefully check the project workflow as each transition may have conditions to check before the transition is made.

The comment of the transition is set in the body of the message.

camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.name: camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.jiraUrl
camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.description: The URL of your instance of Jira Example: http://my_jira.com:8081

camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.name: camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.password
camel.kamelet.jira-transition-issue-sink.description: The password or the API Token to access Jira
